H0.text: Who hosted the 2006 Academy Awards ceremony. Jon Stewart

H1.text: Who hosted the 2006 Academy Awards ceremony. Ellen DeGeneres

H2.text: Who hosted the 2006 Academy Awards ceremony. Chris Rock

H3.text: Who hosted the 2006 Academy Awards ceremony. Tarid

A4.text: Actor Jon Stewart hosted the show for the first time.

A5.text: it was stated that 2005 host Chris Rock would not return to host the show

A6.text: Stewart hosted the 78th Academy Awards, which were held March 5, 2006, at the Kodak Theatre in Hollywood.

A7.text: Stewart returned to host the 80th Academy Awards on February 24, 2008.
